import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-admin-dashboard', templateUrl: './admin-dashboard.component.html', styleUrls: ['./admin-dashboard.component.css'] }) export class AdminDashboardComponent { } Admin Dashboard
  • Add User
  • All Users
  • Edit User
  • Add Subject
  • All Subjects
  • Edit Subject
  • View All Attendance

Add User

Manage and add new users to the system.

All Users

View a list of all users in the system.

Edit User

Edit details of existing users.

Add Subject

Add new subjects to the system.

All Subjects

View all the subjects available in the system.

Edit Subject

Edit existing subjects in the system.

View All Attendance

Track and view attendance for all users.
